name: helperscssmos
description: Herramienta que permite calcular medidas CSS, Helpers Css ofrece además la posibilidad de generar paletas de colores y exportarlas en CSS y SASS/SCSS

scripts.forge: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge start
scripts.forge:pkm: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge package
scripts.forge:make: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge make
scripts.package:linux: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge package --arch x64 --platform=linux
scripts.package:win64: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge package --arch x64 --platform=win32
scripts.package:win32: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge package --arch ia32 --platform=win32
scripts.make:linux: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge make --arch x64 --platform=linux
scripts.make:win64: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge make --arch x64 --platform=win32
scripts.make:win32: cd electron && env PKM=electron electron-forge make --arch ia32 --platform=win32
scripts.android: cd android && env PKM=android androidjs build --release
